required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of CS1001 in Combination With Donafenib in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Multicenter,Open-label,Dose-Escalation and Expansion Study of CS1001 in Combination With Donafenib in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and treatment effect of CS1001 in combination with Donafenib in patients with advanced solid tumors.

detailed_description.textblock: This trail uses an open, multi-center study design, Contains two parts: a dose escalation part and a dose expansion part.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the dose limiting toxicity (DLT)
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the maximum tolerated dose(MTD)
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the recommended dose of phase II
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate as determined by the Invertigator using RECIST V1.1
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

arm_group.arm_group_label: Squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck
arm_group.description: Squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck（HNSCC）

intervention.description: dose escalation: Donafenib 100 mg QD/100 mg BID/200 mg BID (p.o.). dose expansion: Patients will be assigned to specific tumor types and treated at the recommended dose for dose escalation.The recommended dose for dose escalation will be determined by the dose escalation study.
intervention.arm_group_label: Squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck

intervention.description: CS1001 will be administrated by intravenous (i.v.) infusion once every 28 days
intervention.arm_group_label: Squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck
